title: Saint Joan of Arc
Born: Jeanne d'Arc 6 January  c.   1412  Domremy, Duchy of Bar, Kingdom of France
Died: 30 May 1431 (aged approx. 19)    Rouen, Normandy  (then under English rule)
Beatified: 18 April 1909, Notre-Dame de Paris, by Pope Pius X
Canonized: 16 May 1920, St. Peter's Basilica, Rome by Pope Benedict XV
Patronage: soldiers, women who have served in the WAVES (Women Accepted for Volunteer Emergency Service)
